api_base.description: The base URL of the LiteLLM API. Can also be set via the LITELLM_API_BASE environment variable.

api_key.description: The API key for authenticating with LiteLLM. Can also be set via the LITELLM_API_KEY environment variable.

insecure_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate verification. Defaults to false.

litellm_changed_by.description: Value for the litellm-changed-by header to track actions performed by authorized users.

block.description: Terraform provider for managing LiteLLM resources.

access_group.description: The name of the access group.

id.description: The unique identifier for this access group (same as access_group name).

model_names.description: List of model names (model_name from litellm_model) to include in this access group.

models_updated.description: Number of model deployments updated when the access group was created/updated.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM access group. Access groups allow you to group models together for access control on keys and teams.

budget_id.description: The unique budget ID. If not specified, one will be generated.

budget_reset_at.description: Datetime when the budget is reset (computed).

id.description: The unique identifier for this budget (same as budget_id).

max_budget.description: Max budget in USD. Requests will fail if this budget is exceeded.

max_parallel_requests.description: Max concurrent requests allowed for this budget.

model_max_budget.description: JSON string for per-model budget configuration (e.g., '{"gpt-4o": {"max_budget": 0.01, "budget_duration": "1d"}}').

rpm_limit.description: Max requests per minute allowed for this budget.

soft_budget.description: Soft budget in USD. Requests will NOT fail if exceeded, but will fire alerting.

tpm_limit.description: Max tokens per minute allowed for this budget.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM budget. Budgets can be used to control spending limits for keys, teams, and organizations.

credential_values.description: Sensitive credential values (API keys, tokens, etc.).

id.description: The unique identifier for this credential (same as credential_name).

model_id.description: Model ID associated with this credential.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM credential.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the guardrail was created.

default_on.description: Whether the guardrail is enabled by default for all requests.

guardrail_id.description: The unique guardrail ID. Generated if not specified.

guardrail_info.description: JSON string containing additional metadata for the guardrail.

id.description: The unique identifier for this guardrail (same as guardrail_id).

litellm_params.description: JSON string containing additional provider-specific parameters for the guardrail.

mode.description: When to apply the guardrail. Can be a single value or JSON array (e.g., 'pre_call', 'post_call', 'during_call', '["pre_call", "post_call"]').

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the guardrail was last updated.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM guardrail. Guardrails provide content filtering, PII detection, prompt injection protection, and more.

budget_id.description: Budget ID to associate with this key.

enforced_params.description: List of enforced params for this key (params that must be present in requests).

id.description: The unique identifier for this key (same as key value).

key.description: The API key value. If not specified, a key will be generated.

models.description: List of models this key can access.

organization_id.description: Organization ID associated with this key.

prompts.description: List of prompt IDs this key can access.

rpm_limit_type.description: Type of RPM limit: 'key' (default) or 'team'. If 'team', RPM is shared across all keys for the team.

service_account_id.description: Service account ID for team-owned keys.

team_id.description: Team ID associated with this key.

tpm_limit_type.description: Type of TPM limit: 'key' (default) or 'team'. If 'team', TPM is shared across all keys for the team.

user_id.description: User ID associated with this key.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM API key.

blocked.description: Whether the key is currently blocked. Always true when this resource exists.

id.description: The unique identifier for this block (same as key value).

key.description: The API key value to block/unblock.

block.description: Manages the blocked state of a LiteLLM API key. Creating this resource blocks the key; destroying it unblocks the key.

allow_all_keys.description: Whether to allow all API keys to access this MCP server.

allowed_tools.description: List of allowed tool names for this MCP server.

authorization_url.description: OAuth authorization URL for the MCP server.

command.description: Command to run for stdio transport.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the server was created.

credentials.description: Credentials map for the MCP server authentication.

env.description: Environment variables for the command (stdio transport).

extra_headers.description: Extra headers to send with requests to the MCP server.

health_check_error.description: Error message from the last health check, if any.

id.description: The unique identifier for this MCP server (same as server_id).

last_health_check.description: Timestamp of the last health check.

mcp_access_groups.description: List of access groups for the MCP server.

registration_url.description: OAuth registration URL for the MCP server.

server_id.description: Unique identifier for the MCP server.

static_headers.description: Static headers to always include with requests.

status.description: Current status of the MCP server.

token_url.description: OAuth token URL for the MCP server.

transport.description: Transport type for the MCP server (http, sse, stdio).

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the server was last updated.

updated_by.description: User who last updated the server.

logo_url.description: Logo URL for the MCP server.

tool_name_to_cost_per_query.description: Map of tool names to their cost per query.

block.description: Cost information for MCP server tools.
MCP server information and configuration.
Manages a LiteLLM MCP (Model Context Protocol) server.

access_groups.description: List of access groups this model belongs to. Teams and keys with access to these groups can use this model.

additional_litellm_params.description: Additional parameters to pass to litellm_params.

aws_access_key_id.description: AWS access key ID for Bedrock.

aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS secret access key for Bedrock.

base_model.description: The base model name from the provider.

custom_llm_provider.description: The LLM provider (e.g., openai, anthropic, bedrock).

id.description: The unique identifier for this model.

litellm_credential_name.description: Name of the credential to use for this model. References a credential created via litellm_credential resource.

mode.description: Model mode. Supported values: chat, completion, embedding, audio_speech, audio_transcription, image_generation, video_generation, batch, rerank, realtime, responses, ocr, moderation.

model_api_base.description: Base URL for the model API.

model_api_key.description: API key for the model provider.

model_name.description: The name of the model as it will appear in LiteLLM.

team_id.description: Team ID to associate with this model.

vertex_credentials.description: Google Cloud credentials for Vertex AI.

vertex_location.description: Google Cloud location for Vertex AI.

vertex_project.description: Google Cloud project for Vertex AI.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM model deployment.

blocked.description: Flag indicating if the org is blocked.

budget_id.description: The ID for a budget (tpm/rpm/max budget) for the organization.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the organization was created.

id.description: The unique identifier for this organization (same as organization_id).

model_rpm_limit.description: The RPM (Requests Per Minute) limit per model for this organization.

model_tpm_limit.description: The TPM (Tokens Per Minute) limit per model for this organization.

models.description: The models the organization has access to.

organization_id.description: The organization ID. If not specified, one will be generated.

rpm_limit.description: Max RPM limit for the organization.

tags.description: Tags for tracking spend and/or tag-based routing.

tpm_limit.description: Max TPM limit for the organization.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the organization was last updated.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM organization. Organizations can own teams and have org-level budgets and model access.

id.description: The unique identifier for this membership (organization_id:user_id).

max_budget_in_organization.description: Maximum budget for this user within the organization.

role.description: The role of the member in the organization.

user_email.description: The user email to add to the organization. Either user_id or user_email must be provided.

user_id.description: The user ID to add to the organization. Either user_id or user_email must be provided.

block.description: Manages a member of a LiteLLM organization. If the user doesn't exist, a new user row will be created.

api_base.description: Base URL for the prompt provider API.

api_key.description: API key for the prompt provider.

dotprompt_content.description: Content for dotprompt integration (Firebase Genkit format).

id.description: The unique identifier for this prompt (same as prompt_id).

ignore_prompt_manager_model.description: If true, ignore the model specified in the prompt manager.

ignore_prompt_manager_optional_params.description: If true, ignore optional params from the prompt manager.

provider_specific_query_params.description: JSON string of provider-specific query parameters.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM prompt. Prompts allow you to manage prompt templates from external providers like Langfuse, Humanloop, etc.

api_base.description: Base URL for the search API.

api_key.description: API key for the search provider.

id.description: The unique identifier for this search tool (same as search_tool_id).

max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests.

search_tool_id.description: Unique identifier for the search tool.

search_tool_info.description: Additional search tool configuration as a JSON string.

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for search requests.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM search tool configuration.

budget_id.description: Budget ID to associate with this tag.

id.description: The unique identifier for this tag (same as name).

max_budget.description: Max budget in USD for this tag.

max_parallel_requests.description: Max concurrent requests allowed for this tag.

model_max_budget.description: JSON string for per-model budget configuration.

name.description: The unique name of the tag.

rpm_limit.description: Max requests per minute for this tag.

soft_budget.description: Soft budget in USD for this tag.

tpm_limit.description: Max tokens per minute for this tag.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM tag. Tags can be used for tracking spend and tag-based routing.

id.description: The unique identifier for this team.

model_aliases.description: Model alias mappings for the team.

model_rpm_limit.description: Per-model RPM limits for the team.

model_tpm_limit.description: Per-model TPM limits for the team.

models.description: List of models the team can access.

prompts.description: List of prompt IDs the team can access.

rpm_limit.description: Requests per minute limit for the team.

rpm_limit_type.description: Type of RPM limit: 'key' or 'team'. If 'team', RPM is shared across all keys for the team.

tags.description: Tags for the team (for spend tracking and routing).

team_member_permissions.description: List of permissions granted to team members.

team_member_rpm_limit.description: Default RPM limit for team members.

team_member_tpm_limit.description: Default TPM limit for team members.

tpm_limit.description: Tokens per minute limit for the team.

tpm_limit_type.description: Type of TPM limit: 'key' or 'team'. If 'team', TPM is shared across all keys for the team.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM team.

blocked.description: Whether the team is currently blocked. Always true when this resource exists.

id.description: The unique identifier for this block (same as team_id).

block.description: Manages the blocked state of a LiteLLM team. Creating this resource blocks the team; destroying it unblocks the team.

id.description: Composite ID (team_id:user_id).

max_budget_in_team.description: Maximum budget for this member in the team.

role.description: Role in the team (org_admin, internal_user, internal_user_viewer, admin, user).

block.description: Manages a single LiteLLM team member.

id.description: Resource ID (team_id).

max_budget_in_team.description: Maximum budget for members in the team.

block.description: Team members.
Manages multiple LiteLLM team members.

auto_create_key.description: Whether to auto-create an API key for the user. Default is true.

id.description: The unique identifier for this user (same as user_id).

key.description: The auto-generated API key for the user (if auto_create_key is true).

models.description: Model names the user is allowed to call. Set to ['no-default-models'] to block all model access.

rpm_limit.description: Requests per minute limit for the user.

teams.description: List of team IDs the user belongs to.

tpm_limit.description: Tokens per minute limit for the user.

user_alias.description: A descriptive name for the user.

user_id.description: The user ID. If not specified, one will be generated.

user_role.description: The user's role: proxy_admin, proxy_admin_viewer, internal_user, internal_user_viewer, team, customer.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM internal user. Internal users can access the LiteLLM Admin UI to manage keys and request access to models.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the vector store was created.

custom_llm_provider.description: Custom LLM provider for the vector store.

id.description: The unique identifier for this vector store (same as vector_store_id).

litellm_credential_name.description: Name of the LiteLLM credential to use.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the vector store was last updated.

vector_store_id.description: Unique identifier for the vector store.

vector_store_metadata.description: Metadata associated with the vector store.

block.description: Manages a LiteLLM vector store.

access_group.description: The access group name to look up.

id.description: The unique identifier for this access group.

model_names.description: List of model names in this access group.

block.description: Fetches information about a LiteLLM access group.

model_names.description: List of model names in this access group.

id.description: Placeholder identifier for this data source.

budget_reset_at.description: Datetime when the budget is reset.

id.description: The unique identifier for this budget.

model_max_budget.description: JSON string for per-model budget configuration.

block.description: Fetches information about a LiteLLM budget.

model_id.description: Model ID associated with this credential.

default_on.description: Whether the guardrail is enabled by default.

id.description: The unique identifier for this guardrail.

litellm_params.description: JSON string containing additional provider-specific parameters.

mode.description: When to apply the guardrail (pre_call, post_call, during_call, or JSON array).

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the guardrail was last updated.
